answers.1: then in fact hercules was ordered to seize a certain boar which at that time was destroying the erymanthian fields and was greatly frightening the inhabitants of this region
answers.2: hercules undertook the matter and set out into arcadia
answers.3: after he advanced a little into the forest, he ran into the boar
answers.4: however as soon as it saw hercules, it immediately fled; and terrified with fear it threw itself into a deep ditch
answers.5: therefore hercules threw in the trap which he had brought, and with the highest difficulty he dragged the boar out of the ditch
